author: Yaron Weitzman
title: The NBA's New Identity Crisis
description: Some are learning to cook. Some are cleaning closets. Some are building 2,000-piece puzzles. The NBA hiatus has players trying to figure out what they like to do when they're not playing hoops.
content:
Cody Zeller was wandering the aisles of a supermarket the other day. It was a rare trip outside the home for the Charlotte Hornets center.
In the wake of the current coronavirus pandemic, Zeller, like so many others across the country, had been practicing so… [+5901 chars]
